meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Robert Bottome Linda Nelson David Rice Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1414.

td.p: Robert Bottome, an industrial hygienist originally from Caracas, Venezuela
Linda Nelson, a hairdresser from San Diego, California
David Rice, a substitute English and speech teacher from Clarendon Hills, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $6,300)

tr.td: THE CIVIL WAR
FRENCH CLASS
FACTS & FIGURES
COUNTRY SONGS
TOYS & GAMES
IT'S QUESTIONABLE

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Robert E. Lee

Robert
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [sees Robert\'s response] I can\'t make out what you were going for.)
(Robert: Well, I couldn\'t make it out either.)
(Alex: Oh good, we\'ll leave it as a mystery.)
RobertWhat was the [illegible]
$4,480
LindaWhat was President of the U.S.
$200
DavidWhat is the House of Burgesses
$3,600
House of Burgesses')

tr.td: HISTORY
It was the first elected legislative body in the New World
David
Linda
Robert
2-day champion: $16,300
2nd place: Bassett entertainment center & Magnavox 20" TV + The Jeopardy! Book & Jeopardy! box game or computerized version
3rd place: Maytag dishwasher + The Jeopardy! Book & Jeopardy! box game or computerized version
David
Linda
Robert

19 R,
3 W
(including 2 DDs)

12 R,
1 W
(including 1 DD)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
